https://tmrev.io/movie/300282-Christa McAuliffe: Reach for the Stars 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/v3srcnizNi9mgglt3XbTqH9xJch.jpg The amazing story of NASA's Teacher in Space, Christa McAuliffe - and the impact her death had on her family and the nation - watching in horror as space shuttle Challenger exploded on January 28th 1986. Narrated by Susan Sarandon, music by Carly Simon. Christa McAuliffe: Reach for the Stars
